Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Lucia's M.I.N.D. is now shaking violently, killing the lights in her surroundings. The Mind Beacon in the distance seems to have grown dimmer, too."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Something might have happened to Commandant out there. I need to go now. There's still time to stop my M.I.N.D. from being devoured!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pitch darkness does not stop Lucia.'}
{3: 'Shards of memory hover in the air, seemingly luring her to reach out for them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'These... are what happened before the divergence point.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She reaches out for the shard in front of her, but she stops as she hesitates and looks up at the Mind Beacon.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It could be a clue, or it could be a trap to stall me...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia feels much safer seeing the Mind Beacon's soothing light. She reaches out for the shard."}
{3: 'Then, she hears a youthful voice coming from the depths of the abyss...'}
{3: '～Dear black sheep, the child of the sun and winter...～'}
{3: '～Born into a herd of white sheep, trotting across the pure snow.～', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is this... the nursery rhyme from my childhood?', 4: '1'}
{3: '～Dear black sheep, whose black wool the sun loves...～'}
{3: '～Would you share some of your warmth with me?～'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Of course. Come and stay here with me.'}
{3: '～Dear black sheep, the sheep they all hate...～'}
{3: '～Why must you be different from the rest?～'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Lucia, why are they afraid of me?', 4: '1'}
{3: '～Dear black sheep, the sheep without wool...～'}
{3: "Lucia's M.I.N.D. is now shaking violently again, sending the shards of memories flying in the air."}
{3: '～Bzz... You are special... Zzz... Needs to be caught... Bzz... for more people... Zzz...～'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Whether it's Luna or me, being chosen by the Ascension-Network was just the beginning.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Mind Beacon is now flashing rapidly, as if calling for Lucia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "These memories won't change a thing no matter how much time I spend looking at them. I should go now. They're waiting for me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pitch darkness clears up. Right above the abyss, a star shines brighter than ever.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Target found. I'm moving on.", 4: '1'}
